reset_warning.message: Resetting ArConnect will remove all of your data from it. This includes your wallets, your settings and cached data.

about_arweave.message: Arweave is a protocol that allows you to store data permanently, sustainably, with a single upfront fee. The protocol matches people who have hard drive space to spare with those individuals and organizations that need to store data or host content permanently.

about_permaweb.message: The permaweb on Arweave is the next evolution of the web, allowing developers and users to share a resilient knowledge base that is replicated in vast numbers across the world, perpetually. Besides data, Arweave also hosts a number of fully decentralized, permanent applications.
about_permaweb.description: A short paragraph explaining the permaweb

about_arconnect.message: ArConnect is crypto wallet extension allowing you to interact with permaweb apps securely. It also lets you to store and manage your funds easily. With ArConnect, your entry to the Arweave ecosystem will be simple and seamless.

backup_wallet_content.message: Save this 12 word seedphrase to a password manager, or write it down to a paper. Never share it with anyone.
